Given an input sentence, edit the sentence such that it is grammatically correct and has similar meaning, while also incorporating the following constraints:
- The sentence must include at least one gerund phrase and one prepositional phrase.
- The sentence must use a synonym for the word "bookstore."
- The sentence must also include a conditional clause.
Example rewritten prompt: 
If they decide to embark on a literary adventure, they could be found perusing the shelves of the local bibliotheca in search of some literature to purchase, all while contemplating the joys of reading.

If they choose to embark on a literary journey, they might find themselves exploring the aisles of the neighborhood bookshop, all while considering the pleasure of reading and savoring the experience of discovering new stories.
